@markzuckertrash @Daytrader326 I guess you are the one that needs to go back and do some DD.  MNDT is the PLAY.  We spotted it early and you were a bear at almost $16??  Really.   MNDT has a number of tailwinds behind it now. 1. Cybersecurity will become a primary focal point this year and the industry will experience a big boost to it's growth. 2. Earnings, profitablity, and lower debt are all moving in the right direction now that they've separated from FireEye. 3. Possible buyout from $MSFT. I believe we will see consolidation in the cybersecurity industry this year and next as it becomes a major growth industry. 4. Strengthening of their premier services of cyber Intel and incident response. MNDT is the market leader in these areas.
